Class Hash

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hash

  • public class Hash
extends Object
    Hash class creates the hash table for the omitted words to be compared to the input text
    Author:
    Chris Hopp version 08.18.2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hash(PrintWriter pw)
      Hash constructor creates a new array for the hash table and allows the user to input the omitted words

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int hashKey(String s)
      hashKey method generates a hash key for each word
      int linearProbe(int key)
      linearProbe method resolves collisions using linear probing
      boolean omit(String term)
      omit method compares the input text to the omitted words to determine if a word should be omitted
      void printArray()
      printArray method prints the hash table and the number of collisions
      void readOmit()
      readOmit method reads the omitted words from the omit.txt file and inputs it into the hash table.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hash

        public Hash(PrintWriter pw)
        Hash constructor creates a new array for the hash table and allows the user to input the omitted words
        Parameters:
        pw - , print writer object that is responsible for writing to the csis.txt file

    • Method Detail

      • hashKey

        public int hashKey(String s)
        hashKey method generates a hash key for each word
        Parameters:
        s - the word that is being hashed to generate a index value into the hash table
        Returns:
        the index value that is generated to be put into the hash table

      • linearProbe

        public int linearProbe(int key)
        linearProbe method resolves collisions using linear probing
        Parameters:
        key - the key that is being rehashed to generate a new index value into the hash table
        Returns:
        the index value that is being genreated to be put into the hash table

      • omit

        public boolean omit(String term)
        omit method compares the input text to the omitted words to determine if a word should be omitted
        Parameters:
        term - the term that is being read from the input to be compared to the hash table
        Returns:
        true if the term is to be omitted

      • printArray

        public void printArray()
        printArray method prints the hash table and the number of collisions

      • readOmit

        public void readOmit()
              throws FileNotFoundException
        readOmit method reads the omitted words from the omit.txt file and inputs it into the hash table. Calls the linearProbe method to resolve collisions and tracks the number of collisions
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException
